snoopy.blindnote: sno/scaRNAs with same target 18S rRNA U406 : SNORA71A SNORA71B SNORA71C SNORA71D (20100624末安)snoRNABaseを参考にsequenceを5'側から1nt増やした3'側から3nt増やした,NCBIを参考にaccession Noを加えた,UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋。
snoopy.evidence: Ganot, P., Bortolin, M. L., and Kiss, T. (1997a). Site-specific pseudouridine formation in preribosomal RNA is guided by small nucleolar RNAs. Cell 89, 799-809, Ganot, P., Caizergues-Ferrer, M., and Kiss, T. (1997b). The family of box ACA small nucleolar RNAs is defined by an evolutionarily conserved secondary structure and ubiquitous sequence elements essential for RNA accumulation. Genes Dev 11, 941-956.
